txt.en: You can manage your quests in your quest log, adding and removing quests from the tracker.  You can also open your quest log by clicking the ring icon in the tracker.

You can manage your quests in your quest log, adding and removing quests from the tracker. You can also open your quest log by clicking the ring icon in the tracker. Additionally, the <rgb=#FFFF00>Show History</rgb> button allows you to easily review the many steps you have taken on a particular quest and the <rgb=#FFFF00>Find a Fellowship</rgb> button allows you to mark yourself as a player looking for a group with other players for a given quest.
